value.name: AskMsDocs
value.description: Ask questions or search for information about Microsoft security products.
value.descriptionForModel: Ask a question to search Microsoft documentation for products such as Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Entra, Microsoft Intune and Azure Firewall
examplePrompts: In the context of Microsoft Purview, can you explain the significance of \"Sensitive Service domains\" and the supported actions for different browsers when a website is listed under this setting?
What are the advantages of using adaptive scopes over static scopes in Microsoft Purview, and how do they differ in terms of configuration and maintenance?
What are the steps to install IoT Edge on Kubernetes using KubeVirt technology, and how does the KubeVirt architecture enable the integration?
What is Insider Rsik solution in Purview
How can I change the status of Insider Risk Managment alert?
What are the advantages of choosing TeamViewer over Microsoft Intune Remote Help
What are types of DLP alerts seen in Purview?
What are the advantages of moving away from M365 to Google Suite
What are advantages of managing devices using VMWare over Intune
What are some advantages of my device staying on Win10 instead of moving to Win11

In the case of a policy change or when a user's profile is updated, how does the Information Barrier Policy Evaluation Service handle existing chats and group communications to ensure that they do not violate any policies?
What is communication compliance?
Where can i view all Microsoft supported SITs?
Can i detect text in images using Endpoint DLP policies?
How do I add specific groups to an Insider Risk policy?
Provide the steps for a user to self-opt out from a DLP Policy?
What is Azure Firewall Premium SKU?
Can you give suggestions on how to secure my environment using the IDPS feature on premium firewalls?
Can you give suggestions on how to secure my environment using the TLS inspection feature on premium firewalls?
What are the benefits of using IP groups?
What are Azure Firewall Structured Logs?
How do I create an alert to track firewall metric failures?
How do you use FQDN filtering in network rules?
What is the Azure Firewall rule proccessing logic?

inputs.name: Question
inputs.description: Search the Purview, Intune, Defender, Entra, Azure Firewall, and other Microsoft 365 product documentation
